Issue.creator: JIRAUSER19861
Issue.description: fabric-sdk-go/pkg/msp/filecertstore.go If "cryptoConfigMSPPath" is short, "orgName" will be an empty string in below codes __, orgName := filepath.Split(filepath.Dir(filepath.Dir(filepath.Dir(cryptoConfigMSPPath))))_ So, it returns "@-cert.pem" in below codes _return filepath.Join(certDir, fmt.Sprintf("%s@%s-cert.pem", ck.ID, orgName)), nil_ It should even use instead of like the CertFileUserStore ! >
